articles.content: Hero MotoCorp on May 13 joined the ONDC network, becoming the country's first auto company to join the network. "Partnering with ONDC will further enhance the reach and convenience, providing an easi… [+1855 chars]

articles.title: ICICI Bank emerges the Street's top pick in April, beating peers HDFC Bank, Kotak Bank - Moneycontrol
articles.description: ICICI Bank has bagged around 48 'buy' calls from brokerages, and only 3 'hold' calls in April, thanks to its strong quarterly performance.
articles.content: At a time when HDFC Bank is navigating merger challenges and Kotak Mahindra Bank is rectifying discrepancies in its digital lending business, the Street has selected ICICI Bank as the flavour of the … [+4043 chars]

articles.author: Neeshita Beura
articles.title: Sensex, Nifty close higher after falling 1% intraday; analysts say 'exercise caution' - Moneycontrol
articles.description: India VIX has more room to rise and the volatility could continue until the general election results are announced, say analysts
articles.content:
The Sensex and Nifty 50 fully recovered from the day's lows on May 13 and closed in green after falling almost 1 percent each in the morning trade.
Commenting on the benchmarks pulling away from the… [+2463 chars]

articles.title: UPL Q4 Results: FY25 revenue growth seen between 4% to 8%; Management sees further debt reduction - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The Board has recommended a dividend of ₹1 per equity share on the face value of ₹2 each. This will results in a payout of 50%, UPL said in a regulatory filing.
